title: How To Reduce Crow's Feet | Olay Regenerist
description: Reduce the look of under eye wrinkles also known as crow's feet in 3 simple steps using Olay Regenerist products. You will need a cleanser, anti aging moisturizer and an anti aging primer. This skin care tutorial demonstrates how to use Olay Regenerist products to reduce under eye wrinkles and crows feet.

asset.author: OlayPh
asset.hookText: Reduce the look of under eye wrinkles also known as crow's feet in 3 simple steps using Olay Regenerist products. You will need a cleanser, anti aging ...

transcripts:
[MUSIC PLAYING]

Here's an easy way to reduce the look of crow's feet. This is what you'll need-- a cleanser, an anti-aging moisturizer with SPF, and an anti-aging primer. Start with a mild cleanser. It will clear away dirt and oil from your skin. You can wash by hand or for even better results, use a brush for at least 60 seconds. Next use an anti-aging moisturizer. It'll help reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Apply it evenly and massage gently, using small, circular motions. 

In the morning, make sure you wear SPF 15 or higher to help protect your skin from sun damage. Now finish off with an anti-aging primer, which is great for crow's feet, because it helps soften the look of imperfections. Dab gently under the eyes, on your eyelid, and around crow's feet until it's thoroughly absorbed. That's it. Follow these simple steps every morning. And the look of crow's feet will disappear right before your very eyes. Olay. Your best beautiful.
